name: Akashi Mansion
description:
CONTROLS:

Move: WASD or Arrows

Inventory: I or Esc

Flashlight with the mouse

Interact: E

Akashi Mansion is a horror story game. Follow the notes to unfold the story

This game was made in 3 days for the Mini Jam 125: Signal Theme

The Game is not finished, I will be updating it shortly!

Thanks for playing!

Akashi Mansion is playable in the browser, but I recommend downloading for best experience. Available on Mac and Windows Machines. Downloading is free.
